conclusion: Analyze the path the liquid will take from each entry point through the baffles.
A, B, C, D are entry points at the top.
The baffles are the colored bars inside the black area.
Liquid from A flows down and encounters the black baffle.
Liquid from A is directed towards the left side.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid from B flows down and encounters the black baffle.
Liquid from B is directed towards the left side.
Liquid from B flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows down and encounters the red baffle.
Liquid from C is directed towards the right side.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
Liquid from D flows down and encounters the purple baffle.
Liquid from D is directed towards the right side.
Liquid from D flows into container F.
Liquids from A and B flow into container E.
Liquids from C and D flow into container F.
Container E will receive liquid from A and B.
Container F will receive liquid from C and D.
